{{drawgraph:

target.1 =
    function:derivative,
    value:value,
    series:{gid}_{nid}_nic_{nic}_errin.gauge,
    alias:In,
    interval:2m,

target.2 =
    function:derivative,
    value:value,
    series:{gid}_{nid}_nic_{nic}_errout.gauge,
    alias:Out,
    interval:2m,


cfg.title = Network Errors
cfg.dashboardtitle = 'NIC {nic} ({gid}:{nid}) Network Errors'
cfg.height = 275px
cfg.width = 500px
cfg.stack = false
cfg.fill = 0
cfg.y_format = kbytes

}}
